navigation_layout.label: Navigation layout
navigation_layout.info: Choose between classic Header and contemporary Sidebar navigation.

paragraph__1.content: Only for Sidebar-based navigation.

transparent_navigation_paragraph.content: Navigation overlaps following sections: 'Slideshow with media', 'Image banner', 'Video banner', and 'Footer'.

transparent_navigation_step_1.content: 1. Add one of these sections to the top of the template.

transparent_navigation_step_2.content: 2. Select 'Overlap by navigation' in the section settings.

transparent_navigation_step_3.content: 3. If you use sidebars, select 'Default colors' in the sidebar settings. [Learn more.](https://staylime.notion.site/Appearance-22f4c5706ab347ad910bd719e44f4f3a#6866aa0252b449b3ba5bf58a6b07064e)

line_opacity.label: Line opacity
line_opacity.info: Line color is inherited from text color. Affects all lines throughout the theme.

center_text.info: Aligns headings and content throughout all templates except navigation.

popup_background_color.label: Popup background
popup_background_color.info: Affects dropdowns, search, and modal windows. Choose a color similar to the layout background.

select_text_accent_color.label: Use accent color for text selection

typography_preset.label: Typography preset
typography_preset.info: Presets use a combination of Base and Accent fonts, applied to different elements with various font sizes. ‘Minimal’ presets only use Base font.

typography_font.label: Font
typography_font.info: Selecting other fonts can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

dropdown_icon.label: Dropdown icon
dropdown_icon.info: Shows if nested menu was added in Navigation settings.

other_buttons_radius.info: Including color pills, quick view, and quick add to cart button.

enable_rolling_hover.label: Enable rolling hover for menu items

paragraph__1.content: Displays the variants as clickable buttons. If you want to use pills, please select Column layout above.

pills_variant_label.label: Variant label
pills_variant_label.info: To activate pills, please type in variant label. Separate label names by commas to support multiple options, ex: “Style, Size”.

color_pills_variant_label.label: Variant label
color_pills_variant_label.info: To activate color pills, please type in variant label.

product_placeholder.label: Placeholder
product_placeholder.info: Displays placeholder for products without image. You may use your logo as placeholder.

paragraph__1.content: Promote collections, products or pages. Displays first five links.

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: This menu doesn’t show nested menus items.

paragraph__1.content: To display custom badge with a product, please add the new custom.badge metafield. [Learn more](https://staylime.notion.site/Product-Badges-0c61d51b739e4f9c9ba33450a5951be6#8b89444aedc04007ad886b099255ced1).

action_after_adding.label: Action after adding to cart
action_after_adding.info: Set up ‘Success window with suggestions’ in ‘Cart drawer’ settings.

shipping_default_country.label: Default country
shipping_default_country.info: If your customer is logged-in, the country in their default shipping address will be selected.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

desktop_image.label: Image
desktop_image.info: Looks best with landscape (3:2) and wide (16:9) images.

mobile_image.label: Mobile image
mobile_image.info: Looks best with portrait (4:5) and square (1:1) images.

video_load.label: Video
video_load.info: To allow autoplay video is muted.

video_alt.label: Video alt text
video_alt.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

enable_quick_view.label: Enable 'Quick view' button
enable_quick_view.info: View product details in a pop-up.

max_product_name_characters.label: Maximum product name characters
max_product_name_characters.info: Leave empty or enter ‘0’ to hide product name. Default value: 100.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block).

desktop_grid_type.label: Desktop grid type
desktop_grid_type.info: Slider appears when there’re 4 items and more.

options__6.label: Side heading with two in a row

options__7.label: Side heading with three in a row

target_blank.label: Open link in a new tab

page.label: Page
page.info: Select a page as the content source. Text, tables or images can be added.

sticky_offset.label: Offset
sticky_offset.info: Controls a gap between the top of the page and sticky content.

desktop_filter_style.label: Desktop filter style
desktop_filter_style.info: ‘Vertical’ and ‘Horizontal’ styles transforms into ‘Drawer’ in sidebar-based navigation layout. On mobile devices Drawer is the default style.

paragraph__1.content: We recommend enabling 'Preview inspector' in the upper-right corner to see how this parameter affects alignment in the container when hovering over blocks. [Learn more.](https://staylime.notion.site/Getting-started-guide-4753a051419944fd8496068e182233ee#baea1bc2bd6947519472ba2f82e3f4ee)

paragraph__2.content: Scrolling is enabled if total height of blocks in section is greater than user's viewport.

element_alignment.header_alignment_info: Select 'Stretched’ alignment in ‘Header’ section settings to activate horizontal alignment in block.
element_alignment.mobile_header_alignment_info: Select 'Stretched’ alignment in ‘Mobile header’ section settings to activate horizontal alignment in block.
element_alignment.main_sidebar_alignment_info: Select 'Stretched’ alignment in ‘Main sidebar’ section settings to activate vertical alignment in block.
element_alignment.secondary_sidebar_alignment_info: Select 'Stretched’ alignment in ‘Secondary sidebar’ section settings to activate vertical alignment in block.

image_transparent_navigation.label: Image for transparent navigation
image_transparent_navigation.info: Displays when transparent navigation is enabled.

logo_font.label: Font
logo_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

nested_menu_size.label: Decrease nested menu font size
nested_menu_size.info: Use this setting if you selected large menu font size.

enable_country.label: Enable country/region selector
enable_country.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings](/admin/settings/markets).

enable_language.label: Enable language selector
enable_language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

social_media_style.label: Style
social_media_style.info: You can add, remove or edit your social media profiles in [‘Theme settings → Social media'](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

paragraph__1.content: Activate customer accounts first. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/customer-accounts/classic-customer-accounts).
Set up in [‘Theme settings → Navigation’](/editor?context=theme&category=navigation)
The color is setting up in Main sidebar section settings.
Email subscription creates a new customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers).
Add ‘Burger menu’ block in Mobile header, Header or Sidebar sections to display Menu drawer.
Mega menu transforms to regular dropdown menu if header width is less than 1024px.

dropdown_link.label: Dropdown link
dropdown_link.info: Enter the menu item name to be displayed as mega menu. [Learn more](https://staylime.notion.site/Header-4551f085896b4984b4c183da697b66c4#43e8c4f6b8dc4c549886558023515c05).

options__1.label: Expanded for the first nested menu

paragraph__1.content: ‘Secondary sidebar’ displays logo vertically.
‘Secondary sidebar’ displays links vertically and doesn’t show dropdown nested menus.

show_number.label: Show number of collections and products

paragraph__1.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout).
To add payment methods, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments).

desktop_gallery_size.label: Desktop gallery size
desktop_gallery_size.info: Full-width gallery doesn’t support column gallery styles.

paragraph__1.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block).
Is configured in ‘Variant Selector’ area of [theme settings](https://staylime.notion.site/Variant-selector-646cf3bc793c4d829cf7da5e47efbf41).

show_bar.label: Show bar
show_bar.info: The indicator bar shows the remaining product quantity as percentage of base quantity. Ex: If base quantity is set to 100 products, the bar will display 100% when are 100 products are in stock and 60% when 60 products are in stock.

base_quantity.label: Base quantity
base_quantity.info: Enter the base quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set dynamic base quantities for different products. [Learn more](https://staylime.notion.site/Default-product-c44f1ffd5112446caf05c3794b7c06d8#dd6df70602054cf1867474fcec319052).

low_threshold.label: Low threshold
low_threshold.info: Enter the product inventory quantity to notify customers of limited product stock. Insert a Dynamic source to set dynamic thresholds for different products. [Learn more](https://staylime.notion.site/Default-product-c44f1ffd5112446caf05c3794b7c06d8#dd6df70602054cf1867474fcec319052).

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Users can choose between payment systems available on your store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

page.info: Select a page as the pop-up content source. Text, tables or images can be added.

paragraph__1.content: To display complementary products, add and set up the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).
Helps users navigate between the related collections and vendor.
Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations).
Section is not visible if you haven’t visited any products.
Cart recommendations are based on the items you’ve added.

shipping_country.label: Default country
shipping_country.info: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected.

paragraph__1.content: Displays images from the metafield custom.gallery. [Find out how to set it up](https://staylime.notion.site/Image-grid-e090cd7f15a344229d1fd03555a769a8#c00d2ce89f35488b9de1d746ad9504d1).
1. Place a section where users will be directed to.

paragraph__3.content: 3. Assign a link to the address, ex: “#about”.

paragraph.content: Email subscription creates a new customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers).

swap_position.label: Swap form position
swap_position.info: Centered if no blocks are added.

page.label: Page
page.info: Use to show full testimonial. Opens in pop-up.

custom_heading.info: Leave empty to show original Page title.

custom_liquid.label: Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

button_label.info: Leads to Collection page. Leave empty to hide button.

paragraph__1.content: Uses your blog post title. [Edit blog post](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#edit-a-blog-post).

button_label.info: Leads to Blog page. Leave empty to hide button.

paragraph__1.content: Using Slideshow may slightly slow down your store.

speed.label: Speed
speed.info: Time it takes to shift by 100 pixels.

hover_image_width.label: Image width
hover_image_width.info: Works only if checkbox above is active.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

paragraph__1.content: Transform your popup into a promotional powerhouse by adding ‘Newsletter’ or ‘Promo code’ blocks for extra functionality.

delay.label: Show
delay.info: Won't be applied when inside theme editor.

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.info: Won't be applied when inside theme editor. Use ‘No limit’ to test popup.

show_image_on_mobile.label: Show image on mobile
show_image_on_mobile.info: Hidden by default to comply with the Google's [interstitial guidelines](https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/08/helping-users-easily-access-content-on) for improved SEO.

paragraph__1.content: Transform your flyout into a promotional powerhouse by adding ‘Newsletter’ or ‘Promo code’ blocks for extra functionality.

frequency.info: Won't be applied when inside theme editor. Use ‘No limit’ to test flyout.

paragraph__2.content: Collapse the flyout into a sticky tab when it’s closed.

paragraph.content: Opens a video in pop-up on click.

paragraph__1.content: If a link to a social media post is attached, the featured image will be displayed as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: The preview image is included with store title and description. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Random products from the related collection will appear each time the page is reloaded, if it has 7 or more products.

horizontal_position.label: Horizontal position
horizontal_position.info: Only if a mobile image is set.
